item.title: The conversation between you and me
item.description: Today was a tiring day for me. My work is so demanding. Do I need it? Of course, and I even enjoy it. It’s always the same thing - railways, bridges and sometimes also rope. The reason for this is probably my lack of creativity. But in other areas it’s different. People are so antediluvian. God gave them consciousness, the greatest capacity for thought, and yet there is someone who enjoys watching these supposedly “genius” creatures drive themselves to destruction.
